backend/main.mo: Implements lead submission storage with validation, and an admin‑restricted query to retrieve all leads using access control.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries for major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and content modules.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes using custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting meta tags, fonts, and mounting the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and renders the router inside the main App component.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with branding, navigation links, social icons, and dynamic service navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation, logo, and CTAs including WhatsApp expert contact and consultation links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main site layout with header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutWh: Renders About and Why Choose Us sections using content and icons, with a CTA button to contact.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Displays FAQ items in an accordion layout using faqData.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Shows a grid of testimonial cards with star ratings and a button to view more.
frontend/src/content/about.ts: Exports about page text including description, keywords, and reasons to choose the service.
frontend/src/content/blogPosts.ts: Defines blog post interface and a list of detailed sample blog posts with headings and body text.
frontend/src/content/faq.ts: Exports FAQ items containing common tax-related questions and answers.
frontend/src/content/homeContent.ts: Provides homepage headline, intro text, and CTA bullet points.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines service interface and detailed service entries with summaries, keywords, and key benefits.
frontend/src/content/testimonials.ts: Exports a list of client testimonials with name, type, and quote.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting leads and fetching all leads via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme color variables for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Renders a blog listing page with SEO setup and navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with SEO metadata and related action links.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form that submits leads and offers WhatsApp contact options.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero content, CTAs, SEO metadata, and support sections.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders pricing tiers for tax services with WhatsApp contact actions and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the privacy policy content and sets appropriate page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a selected service, including benefits and WhatsApp inquiry option.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all services with summaries, key benefits, and navigation to detail pages plus WhatsApp contact.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays terms and conditions content and sets SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Shows client testimonials with ratings and includes a call-to-action to contact the service.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Sets document title and ensures description and keyword meta tags exist and are updated.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and retrieve or clear them.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp message URL using a predefined business number and an encoded template message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, goals, requirements, design notes, and existing implemented features.
